detectors.description:
DefiStake.toggleSaleState() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DefiStake.sol#826-828) uses a Boolean constant improperly:
	-saleIsOn = ! saleIsOn (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DefiStake.sol#827)
function isContract(address account) internal view returns (bool) { (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DefiStake.sol)#183

DefiStake._transfer(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DefiStake.sol#658-667) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- _balances[sender] = _balances[sender].sub(amount,ERC20: transfer amount exceeds balance) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DefiStake.sol#664)
	- _balances[recipient] = _balances[recipient].add(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DefiStake.sol#665)

detectors.description:
Low level call in Address.sendValue(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DefiStake.sol#210-216):
	- (success) = recipient.call{value: amount}() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DefiStake.sol#214)

Low level call in Address._functionCallWithValue(address,bytes,uint256,string) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DefiStake.sol#276-297):
	- (success,returndata) = target.call{value: weiValue}(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DefiStake.sol#280)
Parameter DefiStake.withdrawToken(IERC20)._token (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DefiStake.sol#830) is not in mixedCase
